auth.otp_message: Please enter the 6-digit verification code we sent via email
auth.otp_description: (we want to make sure it's you before we connect a vessel)
auth.reset: Your password has been reset successfully.

errors.credentials: Your e-mail address and password didn't match. Please try again.
errors.agreed_to_terms: You must agree to the terms of use to continue

404.title: This page’s gone sailing.
404.text: If you feel that it’s not right, please send us a message at

charts.mixedChart: Log entry per month per year
charts.HeatmapChart: Log entry per month per weekday

boat.name: Boat Name | Names

token_modal.title: Boat's token
token_modal.message: Copy paste this token into your PostgSail plugin instance of Signalk.

boat.signalk: This data is pulled from the Vessel Base Data with SignalK.

messages.pending: Your boat has not sent any data to PostgSail yet, things should be fine when she connects
messages.offline: Your boat has been offline since {0} but it is configured for PostgSail, things should be fine when she comes back online
messages.online: Your boat is online, last data received {0}
messages.plugin_version: You are running an older version of PostgSail plugin. Please upgrade to latest version

pushover.link: Link Your Pushover Account to Enable
pushover.connected: Your user is connected to Pushover.

telegram_bot.link: Add PostgSail bot to a group or direct chat.

msg.website: Website displayed alongside your stats, please enter the full URL starting with http:// or https://
msg.instagram_handle: Instagram link displayed alongside your stats, please enter without a leading {'@'} sign
msg.public_profile: When enabled, corresponding pages like stats, timelapse and others can be accessed by anyone without being required to login.
msg.public_logs: When enabled, your individual log details will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}{1}/log/{0}
msg.public_stats: When enabled, your statistics will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/stats
msg.public_logs_list: When enabled, list of all your logs will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/logs
msg.public_timelapse: When enabled, your timelapse will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/timelapse
msg.public_monitoring: When enabled, your monitoring will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/monitoring
msg.public_name: When you enable your public profile, you will have the option to choose your boat name
msg.public_windy: When you enable your public profile, you will have the option to transform your boat in a weather station integrate in Windy.

monitoring.waterTemperatureKey: Monitoring data source for water temperature
monitoring.windSpeedKey: Monitoring data source for wind speed
monitoring.windDirectionKey: Monitoring data source for wind direction
monitoring.insidePressureKey: Monitoring data source for inside atmospheric pressure
monitoring.outsidePressureKey: Monitoring data source for outside atmospheric pressure
monitoring.insideTemperatureKey: Monitoring data source for inside temperature
monitoring.outsideTemperatureKey: Monitoring data source for outside temperature
monitoring.insideHumidityKey: Monitoring data source for inside humidity
monitoring.outsideHumidityKey: Monitoring data source for outside humidity
monitoring.stateOfChargeKey: Monitoring data source for main battery stateOfCharge
monitoring.voltageKey: Monitoring data source for main battery Voltage

offline.offline: Your vessel is offline. Real-time monitoring requires an Internet connection.
offline.lastupdate: We have not received any data from your boat within the last 70 minutes.

explore.title: Explore Data
explore.msg: List of paths and value gather from SignalK and use to process logs, stays, moorages, maps and monitoring

badges.Helmsman: Nice work logging your first sail! You are officially a helmsman now!
badges.Wake Maker: Welcome to the 15 knot+ club ya speed demon skipper!
badges.Explorer: It looks like home is where the helm is. Cheers to 10 days away from home port!
badges.Mooring Pro: It takes a lot of skill to "thread that floating needle" but seems like you have mastered mooring with 10 nights on buoy!
badges.Anchormaster: Hook, line and sinker, you have this anchoring thing down! 25 days on the hook for you!
badges.Traveler: Who needs to fly when one can sail! You are an international sailor. À votre santé!
badges.Stormtrooper: Just like the elite defenders of the Empire, here you are, our braving your own hydro-empire in windspeeds above 30kts. Nice work trooper!
badges.Club Alaska: Home to the bears, glaciers, midnight sun and high adventure. Welcome to the Club Alaska Captain!
badges.Tropical Traveler: Look at you with your suntan, tropical drink and southern latitude!
badges.Aloha Award: Ticking off over 2300 NM across the great blue Pacific makes you the rare recipient of the Aloha Award. Well done and Aloha sailor!
badges.Navigator Award: Woohoo! You made it, Ticking off over 100NM in one go, well done sailor!
badges.Captain Award: Congratulation, you reach over 1000NM, well done sailor!

nodata.nodata: Nothing here yet! Please configure your signalk-instance and start sailing!
nodata.start: Things will start showing up here. You can find the details of your vessel token on
nodata.wait: If you just entered your token, have a look at
nodata.help: If you are not clear what you need to do for logging, please see "What do I need to use PostgSail?" question on
